message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great opportunity for you to get your hands on this valuable item. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120. What do you think?
I appreciate your offer, Alice, but I'm looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $90 for the product. Can you consider this offer?
Hi Bob, I understand your desire to save some money, but I'm not willing to go as low as $90. However, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer you the product for $110. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice, but I'm still looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $95 for the product. Can you consider this offer?
Hi Bob, I'm still not willing to go as low as $95, but I'm willing to make a slight concession. I can offer you the product for $105. What do you think?
I'm still not comfortable with the price, Alice. I'm willing to pay $100 for the product. Can you consider this offer?
